text:
👇 has been adamant about #Chloroquine (CQ) > #Hydroxychloroquine (HCQ) since Day 1 based on 🇨🇳 studies. 

Another piece in the data puzzle when we see 'clinical data.'  

HCQ *seems to have a diff. effect than CQ for #COVID19 and most *anecdotal evidence of efficacy is w. AZ/Zn https://t.co/mnZYrH2SCT
